name: BlockChain
description:
Made as part of 48hr KiwiJam 2019

A sci-fi dystopian puzzle game with multiple player point-of-views. Control 3 players on their quest to find their lost friend in a falling-apart scientific compound. Open chests, fix cables and pull switches to help them exit their respective cells.

Controls:

  • Q - switch between characters/rooms
  • E - activate/grab/drop/place object
  • W - jump
  • A - move left
  • D - move right

Sound Effects:

Most sound effects by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)

 

P.S. Noooo, it's not Bitcoin.
